# Current Program
```python
from dataclasses import dataclass

@dataclass
class Triple:
    subject: str
    predicate: str
    object: str

# EVOLVE-BLOCK-START

def predict(triples: list[Triple]) -> str:
    subject = triples[0].subject
    predicates = {}

    for triple in triples:
        if triple.subject == subject:
            predicates[triple.predicate] = triple.object

    sentence = f"{subject} is a "
    first = True

    for predicate, obj in predicates.items():
        if predicate == "genre":
            if first:
                sentence += f"{obj} musician"
                first = False
            else:
                sentence += f" and performs {obj} music"
        elif predicate == "instrument":
            if first:
                sentence += f"{obj} player"
                first = False
            else:
                sentence += f" and plays the {obj}"
        elif predicate == "occupation":
            if first:
                sentence += f"{obj}"
                first = False
            else:
                sentence += f" and has an occupation as {obj}"
        elif predicate == "background":
            if first:
                sentence += f"{obj} {triples[0].subject}"
                first = False
            else:
                sentence += f" and has a background as {obj}"
        elif predicate == "birthPlace":
            sentence += f", born in {obj}"
        else:
            sentence += f", with a {predicate} of {obj}"

    return sentence

# EVOLVE-BLOCK-END
```

```python
from dataclasses import dataclass

@dataclass
class Triple:
    subject: str
    predicate: str
    object: str

# EVOLVE-BLOCK-START

# New replacement code
def predict(triples: list[Triple]) -> str:
    subject = triples[0].subject
    genre = None
    instrument = None
    occupation = None
    background = None
    birth_place = None
    associated_bands = []
    other_info = []

    for triple in triples:
        if triple.predicate == "genre":
            genre = triple.object
        elif triple.predicate == "instrument":
            instrument = triple.object
        elif triple.predicate == "occupation":
            occupation = triple.object
        elif triple.predicate == "background":
            background = triple.object
        elif triple.predicate == "birthPlace":
            birth_place = triple.object
        elif triple.predicate == "associatedBand/associatedMusicalArtist":
            associated_bands.append(triple.object)
        elif triple.predicate == "activeYearsStartYear":
            other_info.append(f"started performing in {triple.object}")
        elif triple.predicate == "origin":
            other_info.append(f"from {triple.object}")
        else:
            other_info.append(f"with a {triple.predicate} of {triple.object}")

    sentence = f"{subject}"
    if genre:
        sentence += f", a {genre} musician"
    if instrument:
        sentence += f" who plays the {instrument}"
    if occupation:
        sentence += f" with an occupation as a {occupation}"
    if background:
        sentence += f" and has a background as a {background}"
    if birth_place:
        sentence += f", born in {birth_place}"
    if associated_bands:
        sentence += f", associated with the bands {', '.join(associated_bands)}"
    if other_info:
        sentence += f", and {', '.join(other_info)}"

    return sentence

# EVOLVE-BLOCK-END
```
